name: e2e-automation-tests
description: Automation testing with JavaScript, Playwright and CucumberJs

scripts.test:automation:desktop: cross-env NODE_ENV=test_environment BROWSER='' REPORT_FILE_NAME=automation_DESKTOP cucumber-js --parallel 1 -p e2eTestForBoost || true
scripts.posttest:automation:desktop: cross-env NODE_ENV=test_environment  BROWSER='' REPORT_FILE_NAME=e2eTestForBoost node reporter.js
